semantic_triggers.description: User asks about cell tower tracking before having the CCTV analysis.
semantic_triggers.reaction_guide: 'I can't just 'track' a phone in the past without a baseline, Detective. I need to know exactly what timeframe we are looking at on those tapes first. One step at a time.'

evidence_presentation.reaction_guide: Starts scrubbing through the footage at 4x speed. 'Wait... look at the frame rate here. And the shadows. This isn't live recorded, it's a loop from three days ago! Li Jun's lawyers sent you a fake. I'll write a report on this timestamp manipulation right now.'

Nods at the screen. 'Now that we know the video is a lie, I've cross-referenced Li Jun's device ID with the North Hill cell towers. While the video says he was at the club, his phone was pinging towers five miles away. He wasn't with Chen. Here is the final triangulation report for the Chief.'
